name: Synergy (sammy_abigail)
description:
TEAM POGCHAMP Submission for the ACCD SP21 Game Jam

Isabel Matsuno

Ethan Lee

Kameron Pou

Danale Milloy

Escape the magical forest by finding your friends and working together to obtain the lost souls and get out! Each new friend you find will give you new abilities to help you reach your goal :3

CONTROLS:

Q - restart from last checkpoint

A, D - move left and right

Space - jump/double jump

LeftShift - dash

LMB - attack
